doc.field: - Kinder-Care Inc projected its 1987 earnings to be 44 mln dlrs. Richard Grassgreen, president of the company, said earnings per share are expected to be between 97 cts and one dlr in comparison to 75 cts earnings per share for the fiscal year ended August 29, 1986, and 80 cts for the trailing 12 months ended November 1986. Greengrass said this represents an earnings per share increase of approximately 25 to 30 pct. The company said it changed its fiscal year end from August 31 to December 31.
